item.title: INTRO
item.dc:creator: epico
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row background_color="#ffffff" row_padding_top="225" row_padding_bottom="0"][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][custom_title title="WELCOME TO VERTEX" title_color="#565656" title_fontsize="48" letter_spacing="2" style="rotated_square" shape_border_color="#1abc9c" shape_fill_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.46)"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row background_color="#ffffff" row_padding_top="0" row_padding_bottom="120"][vc_column width="1/4"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]

Vertex is a creative multi page as well as a one page WordPress theme

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row background_color="#ffffff" row_padding_bottom="170"][vc_column width="1/4"][iconbox_top_noborder title="CREATIVE DESIGN" title_color="#565656" content_text="Features like Epico slider, custom portfolio created a stunning environment" content_color="#6d6d6d" icon="clipboard4" alignment="center_alignment" icon_color="#565656" icon_animation="fade-in-left" icon_animation_delay="350"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][iconbox_top_noborder title="WEB DESIGN" title_color="#565656" content_text="We utilized the latest trends in web design, and worked hard to prettify them" content_color="#6d6d6d" icon="monitor2" alignment="center_alignment" icon_color="#565656" icon_animation="fade-in-left" icon_animation_delay="150"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][iconbox_top_noborder title="WEB DEVELOPING" title_color="#565656" content_text="Our theme is an interactive template that is super easy to work with" content_color="#6d6d6d" icon="cog2" alignment="center_alignment" icon_color="#565656" icon_animation="fade-in-right" icon_animation_delay="250"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][iconbox_top_noborder title="SUPPORT" title_color="#565656" content_text="Accessibility is one of our major concerns, excellent customer service is our goal" content_color="#6d6d6d" icon="umbrella3" alignment="center_alignment" icon_color="#565656" icon_animation="fade-in-right" icon_animation_delay="400"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: SERVICE
item.dc:creator: epico
item.content:encoded: [vc_row row_padding_top="160" row_padding_bottom="170"][vc_column width="1/2"][textbox title="WE CREATE AWESOME STUFF " title_color="#565656" title_fontsize="40" subtitle="Everything you have always wanted" subtitle_color="#6d6d6d" text_title_border="left_border" text_border_underline_color="#1abc9c" content_fontsize="14" text_content_color="#6d6d6d" text_animation="fade-in" text_animation_delay="50"][vc_empty_space height="25"][vc_column_text]Our main intention was to let you create awesome stuff with absolutely zero knowledge of programming, websites that are elegant and chic as well as easy to manage. To alter or even redesign your WordPress based web site you won't need to hire a developer any more all you need is a tiny little bit of WordPress knowledge.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="40"][progressbar title="CUSTOMIZABLE" percent="85" title_color="#565656" active_bg_color="#007e65" inactive_bg_color="#bfbfbf"][progressbar title="PERFORMANCE" percent="75" title_color="#565656" active_bg_color="#718482" inactive_bg_color="#cccccc"][progressbar title="DESIGN" percent="80" title_color="#565656" active_bg_color="#718482" inactive_bg_color="#cccccc"][vc_empty_space height="40"][button text="BUY NOW" button_color="#444444" button_hover_color="#1abc9c"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_empty_space height="130"][custom_imagebox image_url="EPICO_DEMO_IMAGE_ID" title="BRANDING IDENTITY" title_color="#565656" title_fontsize="32" box_position="right" title_border_color="#282828" subtitle="Believe in us" subtitle_color="#6d6d6d" text_content="You will never left alone, you may contact us on our support forum or on our ThemeForest page to ask pre-sale and/or after-sale questions" text_content_color="#6d6d6d" content_fontsize="13" bg_color="rgba(255,255,255,0.93)" border_color="#444444"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: COOL FEATURES
item.dc:creator: epico
item.content:encoded: [vc_row background_color="#f4f4f4" row_padding_top="180" row_padding_bottom="180"][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1436437381077{padding-right: 30px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;}"][imagebox image_url="EPICO_DEMO_IMAGE_ID" image_hover="disable" image_animation="fade-in-left" image_animation_delay="350"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1439014549101{padding-top: 60px !important;}"][textbox title="COOL FEATURES" title_color="#565656" title_fontsize="40" subtitle_color="#6d6d6d" text_title_border="bottom_border" text_border_underline_color="#1abc9c" text_content="Customized features like textboxes, imageboxes, text decoration and many more are added to let you choose between different styles but still does not restrict your imagination." content_fontsize="14" text_content_color="#757575" text_animation="fade-in-right" text_animation_delay="150"][vc_empty_space][button text="SHOW MORE" url="http://epicomedia.net/vertex-features/" target="_blank" button_color="#272727" button_hover_color="#1abc9c"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: team meber
item.dc:creator: epico
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row row_padding_top="200"][vc_column width="1/4"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][custom_title title="TEAM MEMBER" title_color="#565656" title_fontsize="48" style="rotated_square" shape_border_color="#1abc9c"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_padding_top="0"][vc_column width="1/3"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_column_text]

MEET OUR FABULOUS STAFF

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_padding_top="90"][vc_column width="1/4"][team_member name="FRODO MAYER" job_title="Graphic designer" team_color_preset="custom" team_color="#1abc9c" image="EPICO_DEMO_IMAGE_ID" signature="EPICO_DEMO_IMAGE_ID" description="Every single job is a challenge. You are walking into a new set, a new Character, creating a world and trynig to get comfortable to do your best work." url="url:http%3A%2F%2Fgoogle.com|title:READ%20MORE|target:%20_blank" team_animation="fade-in-left" team_animation_delay="450" team_icon1="dribbble2" team_icon_url1="dribbble.com" team_icon2="pinterest" team_icon_url2="pinterest.com" team_icon3="flickr2" team_icon_url3="flicker.com" team_icon4="behance-square" team_icon_url4="behance.net"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][team_member name="DAPHNE MORRISON" job_title="Photographer" team_color_preset="custom" team_color="#1abc9c" image="EPICO_DEMO_IMAGE_ID" signature="EPICO_DEMO_IMAGE_ID" description="Every single job is a challenge. You are walking into a new set, a new Character, creating a world and trynig to get comfortable to do your best work." url="url:http%3A%2F%2Fgoogle.com|title:READ%20MORE|target:%20_blank" team_animation="fade-in-left" team_animation_delay="150" team_icon1="dribbble2" team_icon_url1="dribbble.com" team_icon2="pinterest" team_icon_url2="pinterest.com" team_icon3="flickr2" team_icon_url3="flicker.com" team_icon4="behance-square" team_icon_url4="behance.net"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][team_member name="JOHN ESCOTT" job_title="Developer" team_color_preset="custom" team_color="#1abc9c" image="EPICO_DEMO_IMAGE_ID" signature="EPICO_DEMO_IMAGE_ID" description="Every single job is a challenge. You are walking into a new set, a new Character, creating a world and trynig to get comfortable to do your best work." url="url:http%3A%2F%2Fgoogle.com|title:READ%20MORE|target:%20_blank" team_animation="fade-in-right" team_animation_delay="300" team_icon1="dribbble2" team_icon_url1="#" team_icon2="pinterest" team_icon_url2="#" team_icon3="flickr2" team_icon_url3="#" team_icon4="instagram" team_icon_url4="#" team_icon5="behance-square" team_icon_url5="#"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][team_member name="MARY WAYNE" job_title="Co-founder" team_color_preset="custom" team_color="#1abc9c" image="EPICO_DEMO_IMAGE_ID" signature="EPICO_DEMO_IMAGE_ID" description="Every single job is a challenge. You are walking into a new set, a new Character, creating a world and trynig to get comfortable to do your best work." url="url:http%3A%2F%2Fgoogle.com|title:READ%20MORE|target:%20_blank" team_animation="fade-in-right" team_animation_delay="700" team_icon1="dribbble2" team_icon_url1="dribbble.com" team_icon2="pinterest" team_icon_url2="pinterest.com" team_icon3="flickr2" team_icon_url3="flicker.com" team_icon4="behance-square" team_icon_url4="behance.net"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_padding_top="0" row_padding_bottom="200"][vc_column width="1/2"][imagebox image_url="EPICO_DEMO_IMAGE_ID" image_hover="disable" image_animation="fade-in" image_animation_delay="150"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_empty_space height="50"][vc_column_text text_animation="fade-in" text_animation_delay="300"]

Our theme design is superior, you may notice its difference with other one|multi page templates. Vertex unlike many similar themes, supports RTL, and looks the same in most of major browsers. Its control panel is simple yet powerful. Satisfied? We are not, we are just in the beginning of a great journey, be with us.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: epico
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my blog. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!
